description:
Once again Rab has redefined just how light a backcountry bag can be. With a reflective lining, the Mythic Ultra 360 is 32% more efficient than similar bags. Its efficiency means less material is needed to provide insulation in below freezing conditions. Constructed with premium hydrophobic down and ultralight fabric that sheds condensation, this bag is fast-and-light at its finest.

  • Thermo ionic lining technology (TILT), reflects you body heat, like an emergency blanket, this improves efficiency by more than 30% over a standard sleeping bag
  • 7-denier nylon lining uses threads impregnated with titanium
  • Ultralight 7-denier ripstop nylon shell
  • Premium 900 fill-power down: low weight, high warmth
  • Nikwax Hydrophobic down absorbs less water, dries faster and retains loft better than conventional down
  • European goose down is ethically sourced and meets the Responsible Down Standard for animal welfare
  • Trapezoidal baffles are angled downward to channel warmth toward your core
  • Internal collar seals out the cold
  • 1/2 length YKK zipper
  • Glow-in-the-dark zipper pull
  • Bonded zipper guard prevents catching and doubles as a draft tube
  • Includes a drybag style stuff sack and a cotton bag for home storage
name: Rab Mythic Ultra 360 -7C Down Sleeping Bag
